lead_paragraph: A three-week winter dry spell left the state’s snowpack at just 83 percent of average, snow surveyors found, a setback as California tries to break out of record drought.

headline.print_headline: California: Snowpack Level Falls Short of Water Needs
headline.main: California: Snowpack Level Falls Short of Water Needs

snippet: A three-week winter dry spell left the state’s snowpack at just 83 percent of average, snow surveyors found, a setback as California tries to break out of record drought.
abstract: California faces setback in efforts to move out of record drought after snow surveyors find three-week winter dry spell has left snowpack at only 83 percent of average.
